title: Enhancing Professional Competencies through Inquiry-Based Ecology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational biology knowledge and understanding of environmental systems
context.additional_context: A blended course designed for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to apply ecological principles to their work

learning_goals: Learners can propose solutions to environmental problems using ecological interaction models
Quantitative evaluation of ecosystem changes can be conducted through data collection and analysis
Project outcomes can be completed based on ecology case studies linked to job competencies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
